SEARCH
Package grafiosch.service

Class SendMailInternalExternalService

java.lang.Object
grafiosch.service.SendMailInternalExternalService
@Service public class SendMailInternalExternalService extends Object
Service for managing both internal and external mail delivery within the framework.

This service handles the complete mail flow including internal messaging system, external email delivery, role-based messaging, and user forwarding preferences. It supports various message types including admin announcements, user-to-user communication, and role-based conversations with appropriate security controls.

Key features:

  • Dual delivery system (internal messages + external emails)
  • Role-based messaging with privacy controls
  • User forwarding preferences and redirection
  • Admin broadcast messaging to all users
  • Conversation threading and reply management
  • Security validation for message permissions

  • Method Details

    • sendFromRESTApiMultiOrSingle

      public MailSendRecv sendFromRESTApiMultiOrSingle(MailSendRecv mailSendRecv) throws Exception
      Processes mail messages received via REST API with validation and routing.

      This method handles incoming messages from the REST API and applies appropriate security checks, routing logic, and delivery mechanisms. It supports both individual and broadcast messaging, with special handling for admin announcements.

      Parameters:
      mailSendRecv - the mail message to process and send
      Returns:
      the processed and saved MailSendRecv entity
      Throws:
      Exception - if validation fails, security is breached, or delivery fails
      SecurityException - if the user lacks permission for the requested operation

    • connectRoleNameToMail

      public void connectRoleNameToMail(MailSendRecv mailSendRecv)
      Attaches role name information to mail messages for display purposes.

      Resolves role IDs to human-readable role names for messages addressed to roles. This is used for UI display to show which role received the message.

      Parameters:
      mailSendRecv - the message to enhance with role name information

    • sendMailToMainAdminInternalOrExternal

      public Integer sendMailToMainAdminInternalOrExternal(Integer idUserFrom, String subjectKey, Object[] subjectValues, String message, MessageComType messageComType) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Sends a message to the main administrator via internal and/or external channels.

      This method is used for system-generated messages that need to reach the main administrator, such as security alerts or system notifications.

      Parameters:
      idUserFrom - the ID of the user or system generating the message
      subjectKey - the message key for internationalized subject line
      subjectValues - parameters for the subject line message template
      message - the message content
      messageComType - the type of communication for forwarding rules
      Returns:
      the ID of the created internal message, or null if admin not found
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - if external email delivery fails

    • sendMailInternAndOrExternal

      public Integer sendMailInternAndOrExternal(Integer idUserFrom, Integer idUserTo, String subject, String message, IMessageComType messageComType) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Sends a message to any user via internal and/or external channels.

      Convenience method for sending messages with pre-formatted subjects. Delivery method is determined by user preferences and message type.

      Parameters:
      idUserFrom - the ID of the sender
      idUserTo - the ID of the recipient
      subject - the message subject line
      message - the message content
      messageComType - the type of communication for forwarding rules
      Returns:
      the ID of the created internal message, or null if not delivered internally
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - if external email delivery fails

    • sendInternalMail

      public Integer sendInternalMail(Integer idUserFrom, Integer idUserTo, String subject, String message)
      Sends an internal-only message between users.

      Convenience method for simple user-to-user internal messaging without external email delivery or special forwarding rules.

      Parameters:
      idUserFrom - the ID of the sender
      idUserTo - the ID of the recipient
      subject - the message subject line
      message - the message content
      Returns:
      the ID of the created internal message

    • sendInternalMail

      public Integer sendInternalMail(Integer idUserFrom, Integer idUserTo, String roleName, String subject, String message, Integer idReplyToLocal, ReplyToRolePrivateType replyToRolePrivate)
      Sends an internal message with full conversation and role support.

      Creates internal messages with support for role addressing, conversation threading, and reply privacy controls. This is the core method for internal message delivery.

      Parameters:
      idUserFrom - the ID of the sender
      idUserTo - the ID of the recipient (null for role messages)
      roleName - the target role name (null for user messages)
      subject - the message subject line
      message - the message content
      idReplyToLocal - the ID of the message being replied to (null for new conversations)
      replyToRolePrivate - the privacy level for role conversation replies
      Returns:
      the ID of the created internal message
